name: Fantasy Mosaics 9
description:
Follow the penguin through a portal in the woods to a mysterious world and help him find a way back home.

On your journey, you will experience a new collection of colorful images hidden in patterns of mosaic and numbers.

Challenge your mind with this new installment of mosaic puzzles and enjoy the journey through a mystery portal in the woods.

This app is not compatible with 1st generation iPads.


- Custom built puzzles in color also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Help the penguin find his way back home

- Stunning background art

- Puzzles based on logic
